QuestData.Title: The Scryer's Scryer
QuestData.Description: Go to the terrace... use the orb.$b$b<Tyrith gasps for breath.>$b$bHurry... they must be stopped... before they can....$b$b<Tyrith dies.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Tyrith wants you to use the orb on the balcony in Magisters' Terrace.
QuestData.CompletionText: Go and peer into the orb, mortal.
QuestData.RewardText: I consider it to be no coincidence that our paths cross this day.$b$bI sense the tendrils of destiny....
